name: Shatty's Adventures
description:
While searching for his "holy grail", Detective Shatty has finally arrived to the house where it is located. Reaching out for what has eluded him for so long, he falls thru a trap door into the basement. But what goes down must go up. Point and Click yourself through an adventure out of the basement up to the first floor to finally complete your quest.

Created for the May 2016 Unreal Engine Game Jam. Theme was "What goes down must go up".
